home_subtitle: Full Stack Software Engineer, Front-End Architect and Technical Team Leader.
home_description: I build scalable, maintainable, and secure applications. I work with modern front-end and back-end technologies, following clean architecture principles and Agile methodologies.

project_types.IoT Workplace Booking:
Web portal able to manage meetings room bookings and / or working places by customizing them with accessories (air conditioning, lights, projector ...).
Collecting information from these objects allows you to monitor the entire environment.
project_types.dart: Web portal for car management by FCA with matlab clients.
project_types.Newspaper CMS: Development of a web portal for the management / publication of newspapers
project_types.Hybrid Mobile App: Develop app in react-native with native part in ObjectC (for ios) and java (for Android)
project_types.restServices: Develop rest services for read/write on Oracle DB.

about_intro: I am a software engineer with strong experience in both front-end and back-end development, specializing in SPA architectures, microservices, and scalable UIs.
about_experience: I have worked for companies like RGI Group, Italiaonline, Fastweb, AXA, and others, covering roles from full stack developer to front-end architect. I build web portals, UI libraries, REST APIs, and mobile apps. I also teach programming courses on Udemy (C, JavaScript, PHP, Angular, React...).
exp_rgi_description:
In my role, I strategically and operationally contribute to the design, optimization, and maintenance of front-end application architectures through the following activities:

- Code Reviews: Assessing and reviewing front-end code developed by team members to ensure quality, efficiency, and adherence to company standards.
- Design and Company Standards: Overseeing the structure and design of applications to ensure compliance with organizational guidelines and best practices.
- Application Security: Establishing practices and preventive measures to ensure applications are secure and free of vulnerabilities.
- JavaScript/TypeScript Optimization: Continuously improving implementations to guarantee high performance and maintainability.
- Technical Documentation: Creating detailed documents on UI architecture, interactions, and behaviors with REST APIs or other data processing mechanisms.
- Requirement Definition: Collaborating on documenting and defining functional and technical requirements for applications, working closely with stakeholders and teams.
- Technology Evaluation: Analyzing and integrating new frameworks and tools into existing applications while ensuring backward compatibility and operational continuity.
- Workflow Optimization: Implementing and managing build automation systems, dependency management, and code quality controls (linting, testing).
- Guidelines and Pattern Creation: Developing technical standards and operational patterns based on specific project requirements.
- Performance Testing and Troubleshooting: Monitoring application performance and proactively resolving issues and inefficiencies.
exp_iol_description:
As a Java Analyst Developer, I handle the complete development of applications, managing both the front-end and back-end, with strong expertise in modern technologies and agile methodologies. My main skills and technologies include:

Front-End Development:

Languages and technologies: JavaScript, jQuery, Angular 10, TypeScript, Node.js
Creating dynamic and responsive user interfaces using CSS, Bootstrap, and HTML5.

Back-End Development:

Languages and frameworks: Java EE, with technologies like Spring and Hibernate to build scalable and robust solutions.

Microservices and Containers:

Designing and implementing microservices using JHipster and containerization technologies such as Docker and Docker Swarm to ensure an agile and scalable development and production environment.

Database Management:

Working with relational databases like MySQL and Oracle to ensure an optimized and high-performance data architecture.

Agile Methodology:

Managing project workflows according to Agile principles, using Jira for activity tracking and planning.

Application Server:

Using Tomcat as the application server for deploying Java-based web solutions.

Version Control:

Experienced with version control systems such as Git and SVN to manage code changes and collaborate effectively within teams.

Dependency Management:

Using Maven for dependency management and project configuration, optimizing library management and the build process.
exp_tecnavia_description:
As a Full Stack Software Engineer, I am experienced in developing both front-end and back-end solutions, as well as mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms. 
Below are the key skills and technologies I work with:

Front-End Development:

Proficient in JavaScript (including jQuery), CSS, and HTML to create responsive, dynamic, and user-friendly interfaces.
Expertise in Bootstrap for responsive design and rapid development of web applications.

Back-End Development:

Strong experience with PHP (using Zend Framework) and Java to build scalable and maintainable server-side applications.

Mobile App Development (iOS/Android):

Developed native and hybrid mobile applications using React Native, Objective-C, Java, and Node.js, enabling smooth cross-platform functionality and rich user experiences.

Database Management:

Worked with relational databases like MySQL and SQLite to manage and optimize data storage for applications.

Application Server:

Experience with MAMP (Mac, Apache, MySQL, and PHP) as a local server environment for application development and testing.

Version Control:

Proficient in using SVN (Subversion) for version control, ensuring code integrity, and effective collaboration within teams.
exp_teoresi_description:
As a Java Analyst Developer, I specialize in end-to-end application development, managing both front-end and back-end components using a wide range of modern technologies. 
My key skills and technologies include:

Front-End Development:

Proficient in JavaScript (including jQuery, AngularJS, Node.js) to build dynamic and interactive user interfaces.
Designing responsive and optimized layouts using CSS, Bootstrap, and HTML5.

Back-End Development:

Experience with Java and frameworks such as Spring and Hibernate to create robust, scalable, and maintainable solutions.

Database Management:

Working with MySQL to design and optimize relational databases, ensuring efficient data management.

Application Server:

Expertise in using Tomcat as the application server for deploying Java-based web applications.

Version Control:

Experienced with Git for version control and managing the workflow of code collaboration within teams.

Dependency Management:

Managing project dependencies with Maven to streamline the build process and ensure consistency across development and production environments.

Deployment and Installation:

Competent in installing and deploying .war files across various environments (development, testing, production), ensuring smooth and uninterrupted delivery.

Development Methodology:

Projects are developed following the Waterfall methodology, utilizing Jira for project management, planning, and tracking progress.
exp_hpe_description:
As a Technical Consultant at HPE, I develop both front-end and back-end software solutions, utilizing a broad range of technologies to meet client-specific needs. Key skills and technologies include:

Front-End Development:
Experienced in JavaScript with frameworks such as Knockout.js, jQuery, AngularJS, and Node.js to create dynamic user interfaces. Proficient in CSS, Bootstrap, and HTML5 for responsive, optimized layouts.

Back-End Development:
Strong experience with Java EE, using Spring and Hibernate to build scalable and high-performance applications.

Database Management:
Experienced with PostgreSQL, CouchDB, and Oracle for efficient data management solutions.

Application Server:
Skilled in using WildFly for deploying and managing Java EE applications.

Agile Methodology:
Projects follow the Agile methodology, utilizing Trello for task management and iterative planning.

Version Control:
Proficient in SVN for version control, ensuring effective collaboration and change tracking across teams.

Dependency Management:
Managing dependencies with Maven for consistent and conflict-free development workflows.

Deployment and Installation:
Experienced in installing and deploying .ear and .rpm packages in development, testing, and production environments.

Client Presentations and Support:
Directly involved with clients in project presentations, ensuring solutions are tailored to their specific needs.

Training and Mentoring:
Providing technical training and support to junior developers in both front-end and back-end development, promoting knowledge transfer and skill enhancement.

This combination of technical expertise and project management allows me to deliver comprehensive and high-quality software solutions that align with clients' unique requirements.
exp_digiCamere_description:
As a Junior System Engineer, I am involved in various aspects of system management and maintenance, including:

Scripting and Automation:
Developing PowerShell and PHP scripts for server-side automation, streamlining system configuration and management processes.

System Monitoring and Management:
Using tools like EveryStep for continuous system performance monitoring, detecting anomalies, errors, or failures.
Managing and analyzing system logs to identify issues and ensure smooth operation.

Android Application Development:
Designing and developing Android applications to enhance system interaction and improve user experience.

Database Management:
Writing and optimizing SQL queries to extract, analyze, and manipulate data in databases.

Monitoring Tools:
Using HTTrack for website backup and monitoring, ensuring service availability and reliability.

Installation and Configuration:
Installing and configuring software and hardware on servers, ensuring systems are operational and aligned with company standards.

These tasks enable me to manage and optimize company systems, ensuring IT infrastructure efficiency and security.
exp_piksel_description:
In my role as a Junior System Engineer, I have gained hands-on experience in managing and monitoring IT systems, with a strong focus on security and operational efficiency. Key responsibilities include:

System Monitoring:
Monitoring systems using Nagios to detect and resolve errors, failures, and anomalies, ensuring the smooth functioning of IT infrastructure.

Backup Management:
Planning and executing regular backups, ensuring data protection and rapid restoration when needed.

Log File Analysis:
Analyzing system logs to identify and address operational issues, improving system reliability.

User Management and Security:
Creating new users and managing their credentials on Windows Server within the corporate domain. Resetting passwords and overseeing user access.

Software and Hardware Installation:
Installing and configuring software and hardware on servers, ensuring they are fully operational and meet company standards.

Active Directory Management:
Managing Active Directory to administer users and resources within the corporate domain, enhancing security and resource organization.

These tasks have allowed me to gain solid experience in managing corporate systems, improving their security, efficiency, and availability.
exp_coach_description:
During my academic journey, I provided private tutoring to high school and university students, assisting them in the following subjects:

Mathematics:
Helping students with algebra, geometry, calculus, and differential/integral calculus, tailoring my teaching method to meet individual needs.

Statistics:
Assisting with understanding advanced statistical concepts, including data analysis, probability, statistical inference, and regression methods.

Informatics:
Offering lessons on programming languages, algorithms, data structures, operating systems, and databases, using practical examples and clear explanations.

Systems:
Tutoring in the management and design of computer systems, networks, and cybersecurity, with a focus on practical applications and problem-solving.

This experience allowed me to enhance my teaching skills and adapt to different learning styles, making the learning process more effective and focused.
trading_intro: Alongside my tech work, I invest in the stock market with discipline and long-term vision.
trading_description: Since 2022, I’ve been operating on eToro as a long-term investor focused on dividend-paying stocks and diversified ETFs. I build sustainable, growth-oriented portfolios with consistent dividend reinvestment. No high-risk trading or short-term speculation.
disclaimer_text: This site does not provide financial advice or investment recommendations. I am not registered as a financial advisor or with any professional authority and cannot provide personalized advice. The information provided here is for informational purposes only and does not constitute an invitation to invest.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro_text1: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect personal data of users visiting our website
privacy.intro_text2: Data processing is carried out in compliance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR) and Italian regulations.
privacy.browsing_data_details: IP addresses, browser type, visited pages, time spent on site.
privacy.voluntary_data_details: name, email, and messages sent via contact form.
privacy.purpose_1: Provide requested services (e.g., respond to contact requests).
privacy.purpose_2: Analyze site usage to improve user experience.
privacy.purpose_3: Send communications related to services, with prior consent.
privacy.legal_1: Performance of a contract or pre-contractual measures.
privacy.legal_3: Legitimate interest for analytics and improvement.
privacy.recipients_text: Data may be shared with technical providers, consultants, and competent authorities, in compliance with the GDPR.
privacy.transfer_text: Data is not transferred outside the European Union.
privacy.retention_text: We retain data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected.
privacy.rights_1: Access, rectification, deletion, restriction, objection, and data portability.
privacy.rights_3: Lodge a complaint with the supervisory authority.
privacy.rights_exercise: To exercise these rights, please write to:
privacy.cookie_text: This site uses cookies to improve user experience and analyze traffic. For more information, please see our
privacy.changes_text: We may update this notice. Changes will be posted here along with the update date.

cookie.title: Cookie Policy
cookie.what_text: Cookies are small text files that websites place on your device to store information.
cookie.technical_text: Necessary for the correct functioning of the website and to provide the services offered.
cookie.analytics_text: Used to collect aggregate and anonymous statistical information on site usage.
cookie.profiling_text: Used to track user behavior and display personalized ads. Consent is required.
cookie.consent_text: On your first visit, you are asked to accept or refuse non-essential cookies. You can change your preferences at any time.
cookie.manage_text: You can manage or disable cookies via your browser settings. Below are instructions for common browsers:
cookie.rights_text: You have the right to access, rectify, delete your data, and withdraw consent at any time.
cookie.contact_text: To exercise your rights, contact us at

assembler.title: Assembler X 8086 Programming Course
assembler.description: This video course will teach you programming using the 8086 assembler language.

sql.title: Database Basics Course: From E/R Diagrams to SQL
sql.description: This video course will teach you how to create a solid database (through the 3 fundamental design phases) and query it using basic SQL (Structured Query Language) to transform data into information, insert, update, and delete table data, and understand the theoretical and practical principles of designing and creating relational databases, tables, and views.

mirko.name: Mirko Buccoliero
mirko.quote: Daniele is always available to help you and make you understand everything you need in the IT field. Very knowledgeable and kind.

alessia.name: Alessia Pecoraro
alessia.quote: Daniele is a true professional in the field. He has proven to be very helpful.

federico.name: Federico Selva
federico.quote: Always kind in his responses and very knowledgeable about technical topics! Truly great, clear in his course explanations. I highly recommend him!

daniela.name: Daniela Tagliavia d'Aragona
daniela.role: Financial and Economic Expert - Executive and Senior Qualification Area
daniela.quote: I met Daniele personally and always had the chance to talk to him, asking for advice and opinions about the job market, interviews, and the kind of training to invest in (courses, classroom lessons, etc.). Passionate, consistent, a lover of learning, he is attentive, thorough, competent, and informed. He proactively guided me through my career orientation path, considering my aptitudes and professional aspirations.

fabio.name: Fabio Lo Guasto
fabio.role: Junior Software Developer - Junior Java Developer Student
fabio.quote:
Daniele is my teacher with whom I started learning Spring Boot, Maven, Git, and SQL from scratch. I also took his Java and SQL courses on Udemy.
I’m really satisfied because he’s truly knowledgeable about everything, always punctual and available.
In 5 months of lessons, he never missed one.
I attended two private schools at a high cost with one-on-one lessons, but none compare to him. I also really liked his teaching method.
I was very lucky because he is truly a guarantee.
Thanks a lot, and let's keep moving toward the next goal!

antonio.name: Antonio Signorello
antonio.role: HR Project Manager / Talent Acquisition / Smart Worker / Blogger
antonio.quote: Daniele is an excellent coach: motivator, communicator, problem-solver. First met him on LinkedIn, then as a trainer in a Java course—he immediately appeared humble and courteous. Solid know-how completes him as a professional.

andrea.name: Andrea Motta
andrea.quote: Very responsive to students' needs and always ready to answer questions about his course content.

francescaM.name: Francesca Marasco
francescaM.quote: Daniele is a helpful and highly skilled individual. A very positive experience!

luca.name: Luca Sartorio
luca.quote: Daniele was my Java instructor. The lessons started from the basics and went into more complex topics. I was very satisfied. Extremely competent and professional individual.

antonino.name: Antonino De Maio
antonino.quote: I worked with Daniele on Angular projects—great developer with solid knowledge in the subject, RxJS, and ES6.

romolo.name: Romolo Velati
romolo.quote: Daniele demonstrated passion and competence as a microservices developer for Italiaonline applications. Always proactive and curious about new technologies.

riccardo.name: Riccardo Di Chello
riccardo.quote: I worked with Daniele on the same development team and from the start, I can say he's a great team player as well as a skilled front-end developer. Always ready to help and contribute to a positive work environment, he's passionate and pragmatic. Happy to have him on board!

lucaC.name: Luca Cainarca
lucaC.quote: I work with Daniele on the same development team. His role is front-end developer, but he is a skilled full-stack developer with excellent skills. I found him to be a collaborative person, passionate about his work, goal-oriented, able to deliver projects on time, and always willing to help. A very professional colleague to work with—and also great to talk and joke with during breaks. I recommend Daniele to anyone looking for a reliable person with strong work skills.

ivan.name: Ivan Giurato
ivan.quote: Daniele worked for us for a year as a full-stack developer in a team. He is collaborative, loves what he does, and is very capable—both professionally and personally.

andreaM.name: Andrea Montoli
andreaM.role: Practice Principal, Fulfilment and Telco Cloud
andreaM.quote: Daniele worked in my team and provided excellent technical skills. He proved to be competent, hardworking, and passionate about technology. I vouch for his expertise and am available for any further inquiries.

daniele.name: Daniele Montesano
daniele.quote: I studied computer engineering with Daniele and during that time we worked on some projects together, one of which was turning a board game into a digital version. What struck me most was his teamwork ability. Even though we weren’t in the same group, he was always open to discussion and idea-sharing about software design and implementation.

marco.name: Marco Gonella
marco.quote: Daniele was my colleague in a development team that worked on an agile project (using the SAFe methodology) for implementing a complex and responsive web GUI with Node.js + AngularJS. We worked together for one year. Daniele is an expert full-stack developer, dedicated and precise, with remarkable ability in dealing with complex and critical situations, always proposing the best solutions. A very professional teammate to work with.

raffaele.name: Raffaele Calandrella
raffaele.quote: Competent and above all very persistent professional. With special attention to work quality and excellent team-working skills. I had the opportunity to work with Daniele and appreciated both his professional and personal qualities. He quickly integrated and made valuable contributions, standing out in the team for dedication and quality of work.

francescaR.name: Francesca Romagnoli
francescaR.quote: Daniele was my colleague in a front-end development team. He is kind, very passionate about his work, collaborative within the team, and skilled. A great colleague both professionally and personally.

mattia.name: Mattia Capitanio
mattia.quote: Daniele is a technically skilled computer engineer, collaborative and dedicated, highly passionate about new technologies. I had the opportunity to work with him in the same team: he was always highly motivated and goal-oriented, capable of delivering his projects on time! A very professional teammate.

davide.name: Davide Perini
davide.quote: Daniele is a passionate, valuable, and pragmatic computer engineer, whose experience is extremely useful in dynamic and fast-paced environments where a solution must be thought out, implemented, and released quickly to deliver value to the client as soon as possible. He’s a great team player, always open to idea-sharing and knowledge exchange. I recommend Daniele to anyone needing a reliable professional.

jacopo.name: Jacopo Andrea La Torre
jacopo.quote: Daniele was a member of my development team, working as a front-end developer on an agile project (using SAFe methodology) to implement a complex responsive web GUI with Node.js + Angular. Daniele is a dedicated person, passionate about learning new technologies, languages, and development models. He showed consistent commitment and precision in meeting goals and deadlines, solid technical knowledge, autonomy in problem-solving, and in completing assigned programming tasks. I also recommend Daniele for his consistently positive attitude and his ability to work in a team, always adding value. Well recognized and appreciated by colleagues for his seriousness and dedication.

yuri.name: Yuri Blanc
yuri.role: Technical Architect - Frontend Lead - AWS Certified Solutions Architect
yuri.quote: Daniele is a highly competent developer, detail-oriented, and very passionate. He’s also an excellent teacher who has produced several online courses on Udemy. Working with him, I can say he is very determined in completing tasks, even the most challenging ones, with diligence. When he encounters difficulties, he is very receptive to suggestions and later independently proposes new solutions or improvements.
